title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 70.12 - Decision of board; time
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 70.12 - Decision of board; time

State Regulations

Within 45 days after the expiration of the time for the
filing of a petition under section 657 or section 676, the board shall make, file, and issue to each affected party, an order confirming, amending or
setting aside the order or regulation appealed from. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
70.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
